Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.a1: We send a daily message (SMS/Email). The user clicks a link to confirm they are okay. If not, we notify the relatives.
Faq.a2: Basic usage will be free (one monitor and simple alerting). Other features and pricing will be announced in the future.
Faq.q3: Is it complicated for the elderly?
Faq.a3: No, it is designed to be extremely simple. No login, just one click.
Faq.q4: What happens if they forget to click?
Faq.a4: We will send a reminder. If still no response, we notify the contact person.
